summary.span: 提供型別，支援應用程式建立之內容的版權管理，例如儲存在 或 中的內容。

span.span: Provides types to support rights management of application-created content such as that stored in a or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如何使用及實作 rights management 的其他資訊位於線上的 MSDN 文件[Rights Management Services SDK](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74491)。Additional information about how to use and implement rights management is available online in the MSDN documentation for the [Rights Management Services SDK](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74491).
